meanings.definition: Lacking in intelligence or mental strength.
meanings.sent1: The feebleminded student struggled to grasp the basic concepts.
meanings.sent2: She felt feebleminded when trying to solve the complex math problem.
meanings.sent3: The feebleminded squirrel kept forgetting where it buried its nuts.
meanings.sent4: His feebleminded attempt at fixing the car only made the problem worse.
meanings.sent5: The feebleminded glow of the dying flashlight barely illuminated the dark room.

meanings.definition: Showing a lack of mental capacity or understanding.
meanings.sent1: The feebleminded puppy couldn't learn new tricks easily.
meanings.sent2: Her feebleminded response to the question revealed her confusion.
meanings.sent3: The feebleminded robot kept bumping into walls in the maze.
meanings.sent4: The feebleminded clock seemed to tick slower than usual.
meanings.sent5: The feebleminded decision to go out without an umbrella led to getting soaked in the rain.
